ai-tha-ap214:1.1_0: “In the wilderness, in the sage’s hermitage,
ai-tha-ap214:2.1_0: Through that deed and its result,
ai-tha-ap214:2.3_0: enjoy the heaven of the gods.
ai-tha-ap214:2.4_0: and it is the fruit of the past.
ai-tha-ap214:3.1_0: my four eons have ninety-two eons.
ai-tha-ap214:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap214:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pāvā.
ai-tha-ap214:7.1_0: Seeing the second chief of the Elders,
